testCase.name: Verify that the email template to reject is correct

issue.summary: Worker Documents - Changes to the worker document maintenance page - Client/Job specific part of page

testCase.name: Verify that the document type is a dropdown box.

testScript.details:
Given: 

  • Logged in as an Agency User 

When: 

  • On the worker’s page 

Then:  

  • The document type is a drop-down list which I populated from the Document Type Name Maintenance

issue.summary: Worker Documents - Changes to the worker document maintenance page - Client/Job specific part of page

testCase.name: Verify that document names cannot be duplicated.

testScript.details:
Given:
  • Logged in as an Agency User 
When:
  •  On the worker’s page 
Then:
  • Try and add new document with duplicated data, there should be an erro message preventing you form doing this.

issue.summary: Worker Documents - Changes to the worker document maintenance page - Client/Job specific part of page

testCase.name: Verify that there is a group dropdown on the worker documents page.

testScript.details:
Given:
  • Logged in as an Agency User 
When:
  • On the worker’s page 
Then: 
  • All groups are an option. 
  • Drop down to be populated with the job type group name from group column in client Job types page.
  • There is no multi select option for the group dropdown.

issue.summary: Worker Documents - Changes to the worker document maintenance page - Client/Job specific part of page

testCase.name: Verify that there cannot be duplicates in the worker documents maintenance page

testScript.details:
Given: 

  • Logged in as an Agency User 

When: 

  • On the worker’s page 

Then:

  • Try adding or editing a document name to one that already exists, there should be an error message preventing you from doing this.

issue.summary: Worker Documents - Changes to the worker document maintenance page - Client/Job specific part of page

testCase.name: Verify that the page can’t have duplicates such as same client, group document type creation.

testScript.details:
Given: 

  • Logged in as an Agency User 

When: 

  • On the worker’s page 

Then:

  • try and create a duplicate group o for the same client , there should be an error message preventing this.

issue.summary: Multi Currency - Timesheet Adjustment Page

testCase.name: As a client user verify that the timesheet details contains the currency symbol.

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Client with Create Adjustments and Enter Timesheets permission.

When:

  • One the timesheet adjustment page > timesheet ID entered. 

Then:

 In the timesheet details section >

  • Confirm that the hourly rate fields display the correct currency relevant to the location. 

  • Confirm that the total fields display the correct currency relevant to the location.

issue.summary: Multi Currency - Timesheet Adjustment Page

testCase.name: As a client user verify that the timesheet details on the adjustment page contains the currency symbol.

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Client with Create Adjustments and Enter Timesheets permission.

When:

  • One the timesheet adjustment page > timesheet ID entered. 

Then:

  • Confirm that the hourly rate fields display the correct currency relevant to the location. 

  • Confirm that the total fields display the correct currency relevant to the location.

issue.summary: Multi Currency - Timesheet Adjustment Page

testCase.name: As a client user verify that the timesheet details on the adjustment page contains the currency symbol when adding/ removing hours.

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Client with Create Adjustments and Enter Timesheets permission.

When:

  • One the timesheet adjustment page > timesheet ID entered. 

Then:

  • Confirm that the hourly rate fields display the correct currency relevant to the location. 

  • Confirm that the total fields display the correct currency relevant to the location.

issue.summary: Multi Currency - Timesheet Adjustment Page

testCase.name: As an Agency User verify that the timesheet details on the adjustments table

testScript.details:
Given 

  • Logged in as an agency user with View Adjustments Permission 

When:

  • One the timesheet adjustment page

Then 

  • Check that there is a currency column on the table.

  • The currency displayed is relevant to the location that is selected.

  • The currency column displays the relevant currency that the client is set up with.

issue.summary: Multi Currency - Timesheet Adjustment Page

testCase.name: As an Agency User Verify that currency of the export of timesheet adjustment page.

testScript.details:
Given 

  • Logged in as an agency user with View Adjustments Permission 

When:

  • One the timesheet adjustment page

Then

  • When the table is exported confirm that the currency column is also exported. 

  • The currency symbol should be displayed as the relevant currency the agency is set up with.

  • The currency symbol should (GBP, EUR) change dependent on the country selected.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Create Direct Bank Worker Page and show in Nav menu
Direct Bank Worker - Rename page in Navigation menu

testCase.name: Verify the renaming of the 'documents' to 'Agency worker Documents' when logged in as a client user.

testScript.details:
Given:
  • Logged on as a client user
When:
  • On the side navigation menu. 
Then:
  • Verify that there is a menu option called 'Agency Worker Documents'.
  • This option will appear after the timesheet option on the side menu. 
  • Verify that there is no option called 'Documents'.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Neuven user Permission list - Add new Permission ''Manage Direct Bank Workers''

testCase.name: Verify that the permission ‘Manage Direct Bank Workers' exits when creating / editing a new Neuven user.

testScript.details:
Given :
  • Logged on as a Neuven user
When :
  • Creating or editing another Neuven user 
Then :
On the user list details screen search for neuven users
  • Select to edit a neuven user > go to the permissions tab and clarify that there is a permission called ‘Manage Direct Bank Workers'. 
  • Select to create a new neuven user and verify that the permission ‘Manage Direct Bank Workers ' appears as an option.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Neuven user Permission list - Add new Permission ''Manage Direct Bank Workers''
Direct Bank Workers - Create Direct Bank Worker Page and show in Nav menu

testCase.name: Verify that as a neuven user with the permission ; ‘Manage Direct Bank Workers' selected the menu options have changed.

testScript.details:
Given:
  • Logged on as a neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank Workers' permission selected. 
When :
  • On the side menu option 
Then :
  • Under the client menu option they should be able to see an option for Direct Bank Workers.
  • This should redirect the user to as page where they can edit / add and view direct bank workers details.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Neuven user Permission list - Add new Permission ''Manage Direct Bank Workers''

testCase.name: Verify that the permission for “Manage Direct Bank Workers” does not appear when creating /editing Agency Users.

testScript.details:
Given:
  • Logged in as a neuven user. 
When:
  • On the user lists page. 
Then :
  • Search for an agency user and edit them > in the permissions tab there should be no option for : “Manage Direct Bank Workers” .
  • Create a new agency user  and  in the permissions tab there should be no option for : “Manage Direct Bank Workers” .

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Neuven user Permission list - Add new Permission ''Manage Direct Bank Workers''

testCase.name: Verify that the permission for “Manage Direct Bank Workers” does not appear when creating /editing Client Users.

testScript.details:
Given:
  • Logged in as a neuven user. 
When:
  • On the user lists page. 
Then :
  • Search for an Client user and edit them > in the permissions tab there should be no option for : “Manage Direct Bank Workers” .
  • Create a new Client  user  and  in the permissions tab there should be no option for : “Manage Direct Bank Workers” .

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Client user set up - Add permissions to permissions list

testCase.name: Verify the addition of two new permissions when creating a Client User

testScript.details:
Given :
  • Logged on as a neuven user.
When :
  • On user lists page 
Then :
  • Verify that when creating a new client user > the following new permissions appears on the permissions tab: 'View Direct Bank Workers' and 'Edit Direct Bank Workers.
  • Verify that when editing  client user > the following new permissions appears on the permissions tab: 'View Direct Bank Workers' and 'Edit Direct Bank Workers.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Client user set up - Add permissions to permissions list

testCase.name: Verify the access rights of the client user who has the : 'View Direct Bank Workers permission'

testScript.details:
Given:
  • Logged on as a client user with 'view direct banker'
When :
  • On the side menu they should be able to see the 'Direct Bank Workers' option . 
Then :
  • User can view this page but is unable to create / edit any records.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Client user set up - Add permissions to permissions list

testCase.name: Verify the access rights of the client user who has the : 'Edit Direct Bank Workers' permission.

testScript.details:
Given:
  • Logged on as a client user with 'view direct banker'
When :
  • On the side menu they should be able to see the 'Direct Bank Workers' option . 
Then :
  • User can view this page and can to create / edit records.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Client user set up - Add permissions to permissions list

testCase.name: Verify the additional to permissions set up as a client user (mutually exclusive)

testScript.details:
Given:
  • Logged as a Neuven User.
When:
  • On the user lists page
Then:
  • Verify that the edit and view bank worker permissions are mutually exclusive and user shouldn't be able to select both of them  when creating / editing a client user.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add 'Add New Direct Bank Worker' button

testCase.name: Verify that as a Neuven user (with relevant permissions) can view the ‘Add New Direct Bank Worker' on the Direct bank worker page.

testScript.details:
Given :
  • Logged on as a Neuven user with  Venneu access and ‘Manage Direct Bank Workers’ permission
When :
  • On the direct Bank Workers page. 
Then :
  • User can view a button to add a 'Add New Direct Bank Worker'
  • When clicked on this redirects the user to an input page.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add 'Add New Direct Bank Worker' button

testCase.name: Verify that as a client user with 'Edit Direct Bank Worker' permission they can see the button to add the worker on the direct back workers page

testScript.details:
Given :
  • Logged on as a client with the 'Edit direct  bank worker' permission.
When :
  • On the direct bank worker page. 
Then :
  • User should be able to see a button called 'Add New Direct Bank Worker’ on the top right hand side of the screen.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add 'Add New Direct Bank Worker' button

testCase.name: Verify that as a client user with 'VIEW Direct Bank Worker' permission they can NOT see the button to add the worker on the direct back workers page

testScript.details:
Given :
  • Logged on as a client with the 'View direct  bank worker' permission.
When :
  • On the direct bank worker page. 
Then :
  • User should  NOT be able to see a button called 'Add New Direct Bank Worker’ on the top right hand side of the screen

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Direct Bank Worker - User details tab

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN user the input fields in the add direct worker -user details tab

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank Worker’ permission.

When: 

  • On the direct bank workers page > Click ‘Add New Direct Bank Worker’ button

Then:

  • User is redirected to a page to crate a new direct bank worker.

  • One the page there is the following fields. 

    • A drop or click to upload a worker image. 

    • An input filed for first name 

    • An input field for last name 

    • An input field for email 

    • Address line one 

    • Address line two 

    • Town 

    • Postcode

    • Country

    • Date of birth 

    • Gender

    • Toggles for approved and locked out. 

  • The place holder on all the input field will indicate what is expected in each field.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Direct Bank Worker - User details tab

testCase.name: Verify as a CLIENT user the input fields in the add direct worker -user details tab

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Client user with ‘Edit Direct Bank Worker’ permission.

When:
  • On the direct bank workers page > Click ‘Add New Direct Bank Worker’ button
Then:
  • User is redirected to a page to crate a new direct bank worker.
  • One the page there is the following fields. 
    • A drop or click to upload a worker image. 
    • An input filed for first name 
    • An input field for last name 
    • An input field for email 
    • Address line one 
    • Address line two 
    • Town 
    • Postcode
    • Country
    • Date of birth 
    • Gender
    • Toggles for approved and locked out. 
  • The place holder on all the input field will indicate what is expected in each field.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Direct Bank Worker - User details tab

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN user that all fields save correctly when creating a direct bank worker profile. - User details tab

testScript.details:
Given:

Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank Worker’ permission.

When: 

On the direct bank workers page > Click ‘Add New Direct Bank Worker’ button

Then:

User is redirected to a page to crate a new direct bank worker.

  • A drop or click to upload a worker image. - search google for an image to upload. 

  • An input filed for first name - enter text (this should allow special characters and be alphanumerical )

  • An input field for last name - enter text (this should allow special characters and be alphanumerical )

  • An input field for email - enter text (this should allow special characters and be alphanumerical )

  • Address line one - this should  allow special characters and  be alphanumerical

  • Address line two -  this should  allow special characters and  be alphanumerical

  • Town - this should  allow special characters and  be alphanumerical 

  • Postcode -  this should  allow special characters and  be alphanumerical

  • Country- this should show a dropdown of different countries. 

  • Date of birth  - this should allow the user to select a date in the past form a load calendar. 

  • Gender - this should be a dropdown with options to preselect.

  • Click save details, the detailed should save without any error .t test this by searching for the file that you have just saved and opening the record an viewing this page again.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Direct Bank Worker - User details tab

testCase.name: Verify as a CLIENT user that all fields save correctly when creating a direct bank worker profile.- User details tab

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Client user with ‘Edit Direct Bank Worker’ permission

When:
  • On the direct bank workers page > Click ‘Add New Direct Bank Worker’ button
Then:
User is redirected to a page to crate a new direct bank worker.
  • A drop or click to upload a worker image. - search google for an image to upload. 
  • An input filed for first name - enter text (this should allow special characters and be alphanumerical )
  • An input field for last name - enter text (this should allow special characters and be alphanumerical )
  • An input field for email - enter text (this should allow special characters and be alphanumerical )
  • Address line one - this should  allow special characters and  be alphanumerical
  • Address line two -  this should  allow special characters and  be alphanumerical
  • Town - this should  allow special characters and  be alphanumerical 
  • Postcode -  this should  allow special characters and  be alphanumerical
  • Country- this should show a dropdown of different countries. 
  • Date of birth  - this should allow the user to select a date in the past form a load calendar. 
  • Gender - this should be a dropdown with options to preselect.
  • Click save details, the detailed should save without any error .t test this by searching for the file that you have just saved and opening the record an viewing this page again.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Direct Bank Worker - User details tab

testCase.name: Verify that as a NEUVEN user the when editing the user details tab of a direct bank workers profile the changes save correctly .

testScript.details:
Given:
  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank Worker’ permission.
When:
  • On the direct bank workers page > search for an existing direct bank worker > and select edit.
Then:
  • User is redirected to the user details tab that displays all the relevant information . 
  • Add an addition alphanumerical character to each of the input fields that allow it.
  • Press save
  • Search for the record again and click edit.
  • Each of the changes should be remembered and show in the record.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Direct Bank Worker - User details tab

testCase.name: Verify that as a CLIENT user the when editing the user details tab of a direct bank workers profile the changes save correctly .

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Client user with ‘Edit Direct Bank Worker’ permission

When:
  • On the direct bank workers page > search for an existing direct bank worker > and select edit.
Then:
  • User is redirected to the user details tab that displays all the relevant information . 
  • Add an addition alphanumerical character to each of the input fields that allow it.
  • Press save
  • Search for the record again and click edit.
  • Each of the changes should be remembered and show in the record.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Direct Bank Worker - Client Locations tab

testCase.name: Verify that a NEUVEN can see the Locations tab when creating a new direct worker profile.

testScript.details:
Given :

  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank Worker’ permission

When :
  • On the direct bank works page > click add new bank worker > On the client locations tab
Then :
  • Page will show a table for the list of client locations for the worker profile 
  • The available columns will include:
    • Client location 
    • Address
    • Post code
    • Miles (distance between worker postcode and location postcode)
    • linked (tick box)
    • tier one 1 and tier 2

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Direct Bank Worker - Client Locations tab

testCase.name: Verify that a NEUVEN can edit and search within the Locations tab when creating a new direct worker profile.

testScript.details:
Given :
  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank Worker’ permission
When :
  • On the direct bank works page > click add new bank worker > On the client locations tab
Then :
  • Page will show a table for the list of client locations for the worker profile 
  • user should be able to click the linked tick box on each line and this information saves once selected. 
  • user should also be able to see a toggle button on the top of the table allowing the table to be filtered to display only linked store or all stores. 
  • There should also be an advanced search option on the top right hand side of the page that filters the table.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Direct Bank Worker - Client Locations tab

testCase.name: Verify that a Client can see the Locations tab when creating a new direct worker profile.

testScript.details:
Given :

  • Logged in as a Client user with ‘Edit Direct Bank Worker’ Permission

When :
  • On the direct bank works page > click add new bank worker > On the client locations tab
Then :
  • Page will show a table for the list of client locations for the worker profile 
  • The available columns will include:
    • Client location 
    • Address
    • Post code
    • Miles (distance between worker postcode and location postcode)
    • linked (tick box)
    • tier one 1 and tier 2

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Add Direct Bank Worker - Client Locations tab

testCase.name: Verify that a CLIENT can edit and search within the Locations tab when creating a new direct worker profile.

testScript.details:
Given :

  • Logged in as a Client user with ‘Edit Direct Bank Worker’ Permission

When :
  • On the direct bank works page > click add new bank worker > On the client locations tab
Then :
  • Page will show a table for the list of client locations for the worker profile 
  • user should be able to click the linked tick box on each line and this information saves once selected. 
  • user should also be able to see a toggle button on the top of the table allowing the table to be filtered to display only linked store or all stores. 
  • There should also be an advanced search option on the top right hand side of the page that filters the table.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Worker - Add New Direct Bank Worker - Notes Tab

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN user when creating an new bank worker details save in the notes tab.

testScript.details:
Given :

  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank Worker’ permission

When :
  • On the direct bank workers page > click add a new bank worker option > when creating a new bank worker. 
Then :
  • There is a notes tab on the screen to create a new bank worker.
  • The tab contains a notes log table which has the following columns : Note (summary of the notes) , Date Added (show date notes was added), Created by (show user who created the notes) and Actions.
  • There is also a free text box to add additional  notes to the table.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Worker - Add New Direct Bank Worker - Notes Tab

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN user when on the notes tab data saves as expected. when creating a new record.

testScript.details:
Given :
  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank Worker’ permission
When :
  • On the direct bank workers page > click add a new bank worker option > when creating a new bank worker. 
Then:
  • When creating a new note on an new record and clicking the add note button the note is saved and appears in the note table on the screen.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Worker - Add New Direct Bank Worker - Notes Tab

testCase.name: Verify that a NEUVEN can edit notes for an existing Direct Bank Worker.

testScript.details:
Given :
  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank Worker’ permission
When :
  • On the direct bank workers page > edit an existing works notes. 
Then :
  • Add additional notes.  - The notes should update and save successfully.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Worker - Add New Direct Bank Worker - Notes Tab

testCase.name: As a NEUVEN user verify the edit button on the notes tab functions as expected for direct bank worker.

testScript.details:
Given :
  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank Worker’ permission
When :
  • On the direct bank workers page > edit an existing workers notes. 
Then :
  • Create multiple notes for the Direct bank worker.
  • In the actions column of the notes table selected the edit icon
  • A pop up appears allowing the user to edit the note and save.
  • If cancel is selected from the popup - nothing is changed
  • If change is selected the note is changed.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Worker - Add New Direct Bank Worker - Notes Tab

testCase.name: As a NEUVEN user verify the DELETE button on the notes tab functions as expected for direct bank worker.

testScript.details:
Given :
  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank Worker’ permission
When :
  • On the direct bank workers page > edit an existing workers notes. 
Then :
  • Create multiple notes for the Direct bank worker.
  • In the actions column of the notes table selected the DELETE  icon
  • There is a pop up to confirm the deletion 
  • If no is selected - note is not deleted. 
  • If yes, delete is selected - note is deleted.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Worker - Add New Direct Bank Worker - Notes Tab

testCase.name: Verify the advanced search function works on the notes log table on the Direct Bank Workers profile.

testScript.details:
Given :
  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank Worker’ permission
( Or )

  • Logged in as a Client user with ‘Edit Direct Bank Worker’ permission

When :
  • On the direct bank workers page > edit an existing workers notes. > On the notes tab
Then :
  • Verify that the advanced search works as expected and the there is navigation at the bottom of the page.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Table showing Direct Bank Workers

testCase.name: As a NEUVEN user verify the data shown in the direct bank workers table.

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank Workers’ Permission

When:

  • In Direct Bank Workers page

Then:
  • There is a table showing a list of all direct bank workers
  • Table to have the following columns
  • Client (Show Client worker is linked to - top level parent)

  • Name (Show full name of worker)

  • DOB (Show Date of Birth of the worker)

  • NI Number (Show NI Number of the Worker)

  • Email (show email of the worker)

  • Active 

    • show tick if the worker is active

    • Show 'x' if worker is not active

  • Table to have pagination at the bottom

  • Table to have option to select entries you want to view

    • Filters number of rows shown on the page based on selection

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Table showing Direct Bank Workers

testCase.name: As a CLIENT user verify the data shown in the direct bank workers table.

testScript.details:
Given:

  • Logged in as Client user with ' View Direct Bank Worker' or ‘Edit Direct Bank Worker’ Permission

When:
  • In Direct Bank Workers page
Then:
  • There is a table showing a list of all direct bank workers
  • Table to have the following columns
  • Name (Show full name of worker)
  • DOB (Show Date of Birth of the worker)
  • NI Number (Show NI Number of the Worker)
  • Email (show email of the worker)
  • Active 
  • Table to have pagination at the bottom
  • Table to have option to select entries you want to view
    • Filters number of rows shown on the page based on selection

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Table showing Direct Bank Workers

testCase.name: Verify changes to data for client user dependent on permissions. - Active Column - Direct bank workers table.

testScript.details:
Given :

  • Logged in as Client user with ' View Direct Bank Worker' or ‘Edit Direct Bank Worker’ Permission

When:
  • In Direct Bank Workers page
Then:
  • If client user has Edit Direct Bank Worker’ permission 
  • Active 
    • show tick if the worker is active
    • Show 'x' if worker is not active
  • if the client user has View Direct Bank worker permissions in the active column the will only see an eye icon to view the record.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Table showing Direct Bank Workers

testCase.name: As a NEUVEN User verify the function on for action column in the direct bank workers table.

testScript.details:
Given :

  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank Workers’ Permission


When :

  • In Direct Bank Workers page


Then :
  • IF edit is selected , workers profile is shown.
  • IF delete is selected

  • pop up displayed asking ‘are you sure you want to delete worker’

  • click cancel - nothing is deleted
  • select yes, delete - record is deleted.

Rule:

When Delete is clicked, Delete the worker profile for the specific client and leave the other rows for different clients.
